CustomField.description: Used to determine whether a snapshot should be shared with compliance consultants (CATS). CATS can set this to "Requested". Planner can then set this to "Shared", which would make the snapshot available to CATS. CATS can then change the status to "Reviewed" once complete.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to determine whether a snapshot should be shared with compliance consultants (CATS). CATS can set this to "Requested". Planner can then set this to "Shared", which would make the snapshot available to CATS. CATS can then change the status to "Reviewed" once complete.
CustomField.label: Compliance check status
